comments.body: I don't know what to do with this comment. Are you suggesting that this is a non-private scheme that you would prefer was private? Or are you approving of the way that this is done? If the former, could you please elaborate on what needs to be done to make this a private scheme?

> I don't know what to do with this comment. Are you suggesting that this is a non-private scheme that you would prefer was private? Or are you approving of the way that this is done? If the former, could you please elaborate on what needs to be done to make this a private scheme?

Just commenting that I liked this.  Nothing needs to be done.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +35,39 @@	groupFactoryRegistry = make(announced.APIGroupFactoryRegistry)
	registry             = registered.NewOrDie(os.Getenv("KUBE_API_VERSIONS"))
	scheme               = runtime.NewScheme()
	codecs               = serializer.NewCodecFactory(scheme)
)
